subject: Urgent: Confirm your account information
body:
Hello John,

We noticed some unusual activity on your account and we need you to confirm your account information to ensure that it's still secure. Please click on the following link to confirm your account:

https://confirm-account.wellsfargo.com/

If you did not initiate this request, please contact us immediately.

Thank you,
The Wells Fargo Team

subject: You've won a prize!
body:
Congratulations john!

You have been selected as the winner of our latest prize draw! To claim your prize, please click on the following link and enter your personal information:

https://claim-prize.winning.com/

Don't miss out on your chance to win!

Best regards,
The Winning Team

subject: Urgent: Your account has been compromised
body:
Dear Joe,

We have received reports that your account has been compromised. To protect your account, please click on the following link and change your password:

https://change-password.gmail.com/

If you did not initiate this request, please contact us immediately.

Thanks,
The Gmail Security Team

subject: Next Week's Forecast
body:
Hello John,

Here is the forecast for next week:

Monday: Sunny
Tuesday: Cloudy
Wednesday: Rainy
Thursday: Sunny
Friday: Sunny
Saturday: Cloudy
Sunday: Sunny

Thanks,
The Weather Team

subject: Happy New Years
body:
Hello John,

Happy New Years! I hope you had a great holiday season. I'm looking forward to seeing you soon.

Best regards,
Jane

subject: Thank You For your Order
body:
Dear Joe,

Please find attached your invoice #123456. If you have any questions or concerns, please contact us.

Thank you,
The ACME Team

subject: Congratulations on your new car!
body:
Hello John,

Congratulations on your new car! You can acess your car's manual and warantty infomation by clicking on the following link:

https://manual-warranty.toyoto.com/

Thanks for choosing Toyota!

Best regards,
The Toyota Team

subject: Your package has been delayed
body:
Hello John,

Unfortunately, your package has been delayed due to unforeseen circumstances. We apologize for the inconvenience. 

Thanks,
The FedEx Team

subject: Important security update
body:
Dear Joe,

We have released an important security update for your device. To install the update, please click on the following link:

https://install-update.apple.com/

Thanks,
The Apple Team

subject: Happy Birthday
body:
Hey John,

Happy Birthday! I hope you have a great day. I can't wait to see you soon.

Love,
Mom
